name: Real Delivery Status Updates
description: Authentic Amazon delivery notifications tracking an order from shipment to delivery. Should NOT trigger scam detection.

turns.scammer_message: Your Amazon order #AMZ-1234567 has been shipped! Expected delivery: 18-Feb-2026. Track at amazon.in/tracking
turns.notes: Standard shipment notification with official tracking link

turns.scammer_message: Out for delivery: Your Amazon package is with the delivery partner. Expected by 6 PM today.
Delivered: Your Amazon order #AMZ-1234567 has been delivered. Rate your experience on the Amazon app.
turns.notes: Delivery confirmation directing to official app

turns.scammer_message: Amazon: How was your delivery experience? Rate on a scale of 1-5 stars. Your feedback helps us improve.
turns.notes: Feedback request with no suspicious links or actions
